title: 自己的服务器总是莫名其妙的崩溃
author: ClayCoffee
txt_content:
本帖最后由 都非常多舒 于 2020-3-18 21:26 编辑 
> #
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x00007f4713105e56, pid=17826, tid=0x00007f469cacd700
#
# JRE version: OpenJDK Runtime Environment (8.0_242-b08) (build 1.8.0_242-b08)
# Java VM: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (25.242-b08 mixed mode linux-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# J 16389 C2 net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.NBTTagCompound.e(Ljava/lang/String;)B (29 bytes) @ 0x00007f4713105e56 [0x00007f4713105840+0x616]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Core dumps have been disabled. To enable core dumping, try "ulimit -c unlimited" before starting Java again
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# /home/newemc/hs_err_pid17826.log
[thread 139941259319040 also had an error][thread 139941264574208 also had an error]

#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.java.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
#
复制代码崩溃信息↑ Paper 1.15.2 b137 总是莫名其妙的开一会就崩掉
https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/vG4NV8Xg4d/

replies.author: ClayCoffee
replies.txt_content:
御炎Roinflam 发表于 2020-3-18 21:19
上传完整的log
https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/vG4NV8Xg4d/

replies.author: Karlatemp
replies.txt_content:
report没有直接给出错误原因，从report看是异步加载区块的时候出现了问题
建议换个java运行环境或者换个服务器核心(更新)
